title: Param Sundari Box Office Preview - Sidharth Malhotra and Janhvi Kapoor Film Runtime, Screen Count, Advance Booking & Opening Day Prediction
summary: The Emmys 2025 red carpet was a dazzling display of high fashion, bold statements, and unforgettable style moments. From classic elegance to avant-garde risks, here are the 7 best dressed celebrities at the Emmys 2025 who turned heads and dominated the fashion conversation

body.raw:
Param Sundari, starring the much-loved duo Sidharth Malhotra and Janhvi Kapoor, is all set to hit the big screen on 29th August 2025. With a blend of romance, music, and vibrant visuals, this upcoming Bollywood rom-com has generated strong buzz among moviegoers. In this detailed box office preview, we break down the filmâ€™s runtime, screen count, advance booking trends, and opening day collection predictions to give you a comprehensive look at what to expect.

## âœ… Param Sundari Movie Details

Title: Param Sundari

Genre: Romantic Comedy / Musical

Lead Cast: Sidharth Malhotra, Janhvi Kapoor

Director: Tushar Jalota

Producer: Dinesh Vijan (Maddock Films)

Music: Sachin-Jigar

Release Date: 29 August 2025

Language: Hindi

Certification: U/A

##â±ï¸ Param Sundari Runtime and Certification

The film has a certified runtime of 2 hours and 16 minutes (136 minutes), which is ideal for a romantic comedy aiming to balance humor, drama, and music without overstaying its welcome. The CBFC has awarded the film a U/A certificate, making it suitable for family viewing, which is expected to boost footfalls during the weekend.

## ðŸŽ¥ Screen Count and Release Strategy

Param Sundari is being released on a wide scale across 2,500 to 2,700 screens in India, backed by Pen Marudhar as the distribution partner. With over 8,000 shows planned per day, the film is expected to have a strong theatrical presence in metros, tier-2, and tier-3 cities.

## Key Highlights:

High screen count across PVR, INOX, Cinepolis

Strong penetration in Tier 1 and Tier 2 cities

Strategic show timings in premium multiplexes

ðŸŽŸï¸ Advance Booking Report: Strong Start

Advance bookings for Param Sundari opened on August 26, 2025, and early trends indicate a positive response from urban audiences.

Advance Booking Stats So Far:

Over 58,000 tickets sold in national chains by release eve

Top metros including Mumbai, Delhi NCR, Pune, and Bangalore leading ticket sales

Songs like Pardesiya and Tera Deewana have driven strong digital traction, boosting footfall
